description: This file is a module providing service functions for managing bookings in a gym management system. It includes methods to list, retrieve, create, update, delete, and enroll members in classes, interacting with the Supabase database.

methods.name: list({ page = 1, limit = 20, memberId, classId, status, from, to } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of bookings with optional filters such as memberId, classId, status, and date range. Supports pagination and count.

methods.name: getById(id)
methods.description: Retrieves a single booking by its unique ID.

methods.name: create(payload)
methods.description: Creates a new booking record with the provided payload.

methods.name: update(id, patch)
methods.description: Updates an existing booking identified by ID with the provided patch data.

methods.name: remove(id)
methods.description: Deletes a booking by its ID.

methods.name: enrollInClass({ memberId, classId })
methods.description: Enrolls a member into a class, checking for capacity constraints before creating a booking with status 'confirmed'.

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^export async function list({ page = 1, limit = 20, memberId, classId, status, from, to } = {}) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ page = 1, limit = 20, memberId, classId, status, from, to } = {})
